name: MySpace Clean & Simple New Home Skin (My Edit)
description:
Nearly the same as Teddy's MySpace Clean & Simple New Home Skin (http://userstyles.org/styles/4618), but with some useful edits thrown in.

A clean, simple, and compact deviation of MySpace's "New Home Skin."

* Removes ads and Google search bar
* Compacts bulletins, friend updates, and friend status
* Moves friends list into the right column
* Removes ridiculously long menu in the left column
